name: Ancient Journey VR
description:
In this experience you have the opportunity to admire unique antiquities from ancient Greece, Rome, Egypt, India and Asia.
You can see about 60 authentic works of art gathered in one place from museums from all over the world.



State-of-the-art technologies have been used to transfer them to VR. All the models are photo realistic and of the top quality.



It is the first museum in the world from where you can set out for a trip to ancient times.
It's the only occasion to admire ancient buildings, search through Egyptian temples,
see under your eyes the beauty of Japan and feel the atmosphere of ancient temple in India.
